overview: Rebecca Bardoux has a long history in porn. With her stunning beauty, irresistable sex appeal and valuable experience, Rebecca decides to take her know-how and make it more profitable as a talent agent for some of the hot new models in the business. Rebecca is more than your average agent however, she's very hands on and is more than happy to introduce her tasty new proteges to the right people and make sure they are every bit the success she is. Besides, if none of her models can do the job, she's more than happy to do it herself.
tagline: Where All The Girls Graduate "Cum Loud"!
title: School of Porn
